title: Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.5 - 13/03/2015
body:
Summoners,

On 13/03/2015, starting at 03:30 AM AEDT, ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.5. At 05:00 AM AEDT, the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. 

We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 6 hours.

This patch is larger than normal and will require additional download time, ~ 425mb

-ToxicHawk

not everyone sleeps like you do

So wat's happening?

It's Bard, the fat basterd.

Santa Clause came to give you presents.

But now he won't give you.
You mean the fat basterd that breaks into everyone's house every year and is biased towards rich kids? That "Santa Clause"?
He gives poor kids gifts too.
He gives the rich kids better gifts, and in much greater quantity. You ever seen a poor kid with 100 gifts from santa? I seriously doubt it.
Kinda arouses suspicions as to what his motives are doesn't  it?
More cookies n' milk = more presents
Indeed. Never trusted the "jolly" fat man anyway. Who knows what he's so jolly about? And knowing what every child on earth is doing all the time? That just makes it worse!
hey stfu, i hav a life, so i dont really read this sht :P

* Bard

still no nemesis draft
why do people ask this.... nemesis has come and gone, wait more than a month or so before you ask for it, its been like 34 days or what not since its been.
so....as usual, nothing for those who only play ARAM for fun.......*sigh*
apparently the new URF will be on Howling abyss? never got to play it on SR -.- damn the lv 10 a day after it finished

Read the notes, its a bloody massive update, they are changing the map, changing the stats of some champs, new skins, new items and all that, I suspect 5.6 will be close to the same size, probably about 379mb or something
final assets to finish the beta of the new summoners rift
Is this to implement a Tribunal system? Can we have that in the 6hr patch?
No lol.

You wants players to actually be punished in the most toxic community in lol? its almost like you think riot cares, look at what happened to eu servers when they tried to 'complain'. Their servers are down pretty much 23 hours a day and in that 1 hour their launcher is broken and they need to run a repair. Its been years since they were promised compensation. they got a ip weekend, which NA also got. unless you play on NA don't think in the slightest bit riot cares.

I played on EU, I starting playing LoL on EU servers back in Season 1 with this account.

The complaints you are talking about are stupid exaggeration. I never once noticed in three years of playing on EU servers any critical failure like the community constantly %%%%%es about.


Also if you ever actually paid attention, Riot blatantly shows they are trying to fix problems such as "toxicity" and server connections. NA just happens to be the best testing ground for new features as it has the highest population.
QFT. I finally got 2 Ribbons yesterday simply from being nice before, during and after games.

I want the toxic players punished yes, but I highly doubt the Tribunal is coming back with this patch, they would have indicated it was on the horizon. 

According to their server status, EU West and EU Nordic & East are up pretty much all the time, just like the rest of us. The servers are rarely taken offline outside of major patches like this one. So your claim is false. 

Errors happen, Riot fixes them. The reason we're getting Patch 5.5 one day late is because they were fixing **your** server. They could have just said "meh %%%% them" and not fix your server before 5.5. They didn't now, did they?

I'm pretty sure their launcher isn't always broken, I barely see any complains on EU Boards about not being able to patch successfully. 

I don't know where they stated they'd receive compensation so I'll not speak on that.

I do play on NA btw.

And Riot is the most player-focused game company in the World. They %%%% up sometimes, I know, we all do. But they rectify their mistakes (most of the time at least).
CAN ANYONE HELP ME? MY PATCH GETS STUCK AT 99% PLZ HELP

why are we getting it so late ?
Meaning?

> [{quoted}](name=rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=iAqsRo04,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-11T01:04:15.807+0000)
>
> Meaning?

i was under the impression that patch was rolling out on the 11th on all servers unless there was a delay i didn't know of

The delay was due to fixing issues with your server. You guys had a server maintenance just yesterday to address some issues. Riot delayed 5.5 by a day in order for all regions to receive the update around the same time. 

You guys usually receive patches 6 - 10 hours later than other regions (which happens to be the next day for y'all) because that is the time your server is least active.

So when you see the 11th, it's actually the 12th for you. As it's the 12th for every other region, it's the 13th for you.

> [{quoted}](name=rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=iAqsRo04,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-11T13:30:00.151+0000)

> So when you see the 11th, it's actually the 12th for you. As it's the 12th for every other region, it's the 13th for you.
